level.text: Not later than December 22, 1998, the owner or operator of each existing petroleum UST system, except heating oil USTs, shall have ensured that the UST system complies with one (1) of the following:
For UST systems installed before December 22, 1988, the upgrade requirements set forth in this chapter;
For UST systems installed after December 22, 1988 and prior to November 12, 1993, the federal mandatory new tank performance standards set forth in 40 CFR 280.20;
For UST systems installed after November 12, 1993, the new UST system performance standards set forth in Chapter 57; or
The permanent closure requirements set forth in Chapter 61, and
Applicable requirements for corrective action set forth in Chapter 62.
No person shall deposit a regulated substance into an UST, except heating oil USTs, that has not been upgraded in accordance with ยง 5800.1.
Not later than December 22, 1994, the owner or operator of each existing hazardous substance UST system shall ensure that the UST system complies with one (1) of the following:
The new UST system performance standards set forth in Chapter 57 for hazardous substance UST systems; or
The permanent closure requirements set forth in Chapter 61, and
Applicable requirements for corrective action set forth in Chapter 62.
